channel.title: transcriptional activator on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in transcriptional activator on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaCDPK29
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaCDPK29 Gene Name: calcium-dependent protein kinase 29 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A CaCDPK29–CaWRKY27b module promotes CaWRKY40-mediated thermotolerance and immunity to Ralstonia solanacearum in pepper.

item.title: CaMYB31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaMYB31 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor Cap1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Natural variations in the MYB transcription factor MYB31 determine the evolution of extremely pungent peppers.

item.title: CaMYB48
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA11g12490 Gene Symbol: CaMYB48 Gene Name: Genome: Pepper.

item.title: CaNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaNAC1 Gene Name: NAC domain protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CaNAC1 regulates low-temperature-induced phospholipid degradation in green bell pepper.

item.title: CaWRKY27b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA03g20260 Gene Symbol: CaWRKY27b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A CaCDPK29–CaWRKY27b module promotes CaWRKY40-mediated thermotolerance and immunity to Ralstonia solanacearum in pepper.

item.title: CmERF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmERF4 Gene Name: ERF VIIIa 4 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: A group VIIIa ethylene-responsive factor, CmERF4, negatively regulates waterlogging tolerance in chrysanthemum.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C016540 Gene Symbol: CmNAC-NOR Gene Name: Genome: Melon (DHL92) v3.

item.title: CsAP2L1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsAP2L1 Gene Name: CsAP2-Like1 Genome: Species: Cannabis Sativa Functional Description: CsAP2L1 playing a positive role in the regulation of THCAS expression, while CsWRKY1 and CsMYB1 may serve as negative regulators of THCAS expression.

item.title: CsbZIP44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g25230 Gene Symbol: CsbZIP44 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsbZIP44 is essential for ABA-mediated carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: CsERF061
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsERF061 Gene Name: group I ethylene response factor 61 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Ethylene activation of carotenoid biosynthesis by a novel transcription factor CsERF061.

item.title: CsLOB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsLOB1 Gene Name: Lateral organ boundaries 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: PthA, a transcriptional activator-like (TAL) effector, directs the expression of the canker susceptibility gene CsLOB1.

item.title: CsMADS3

item.title: CsMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYB1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cannabis Sativa Functional Description: CsWRKY1 and CsMYB1 may serve as negative regulators of THCAS expression.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsWRKY1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cannabis Sativa Functional Description: CsWRKY1 and CsMYB1 may serve as negative regulators of THCAS expression.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMYB14 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMYB14 is a bifunctional transcription factor that regulates the accumulation of proanthocyanidin in persimmon fruit.

item.title: VvJAZ2
